Subskills.name: Rapid Striking
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of attacks done by zeal.

Subskills.name: Fatal Blows
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by zeal.

Subskills.name: Throwing Fury
Subskills.description: Zeal now throws multiple projectiles with increased damage when using throwing weapons.

Subskills.name: Weapon Marksman
Subskills.description: Zeal now works with throwing weapons gaining increased attack range and damage.

Subskills.name: Brutal Slashes
Subskills.description: Increases critical strike damage dealt by zeal.

Subskills.name: Axes, More Axes
Subskills.description: Chance to summon an orbiting axe around the target on hit.

Subskills.name: Slicing Perfection
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating when using zeal.

Subskills.name: Hemorrhaging Blows
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict bleeding on hit.

Subskills.name: Zealing Blow
Subskills.description: Your last zeal strike deals increased damage stunning the target taunting nearby monsters.

Subskills.name: Bleeding Out
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to bleeding targets.

Subskills.name: Finish Them
Subskills.description: Zeal now executes targets below a certain percentage of life.

Subskills.name: Cleaving Zeal
Subskills.description: Zeal now always hits multiple targets with increased attack area of effect.

Subskills.name: Blood Ripple
Subskills.description: Each strike has a chance to unleash a ripple of blood dealing area of effect damage.

Subskills.name: Sundering Strikes
Subskills.description: Zeal inflicts stacking armor break on the target increasing with each strike.
